name: polymer with 2-propenenitrile and ethenylbenzene
and methacrylic acid-2-[(tert-butylperoxycarbonyl)oxy]ethyl ester
FoodContactSubstance: Ethene, polymer with 2-propenenitrile and ethenylbenzene (CAS Reg. No. 106826-13-5), and methacrylic acid-2-[(tert-butylperoxycarbonyl)oxy]ethyl ester (CAS Reg. No. 41892-41-5), graft.
